unnormalised: Tech giant, Infosys, just rolled out its AI-first strategy. Yup, you heard that right! The company is planning a massive investment of $1 billion to accelerate AI adoption among its clients, acc. to sources.
normalised: Tech giant, I-N-F-O-S-Y-S, just rolled out its A-I-first strategy. Yup, you heard that right! The company is planning a massive investment of dollar one billion to accelerate A-I adoption among its clients, according to sources.

unnormalised: Infosys will leverage its “Topaz” platform, an AI-first set of services, solutions and platforms. Topaz helps clients accelerate revenue growth & improve productivity. Apparently, TCS is doing something similar but shhh… that’s confidential ;).

unnormalised: This move comes when everyone’s talking about AI, with predictions of the AI market hitting $13 trillion by 2030. That's a HUGE jump, right? Companies across sectors, from finance to healthcare, are scrambling to implement AI solutions.

Imagine automating tasks, improving customer service, and making better decisions, all powered by AI! They’re talking about efficiency gains of 20-30%, and frankly, I can’t wait to see it in action.
